overview: From 2025-10-01 to 2025-10-02, elizaos-plugins/plugin-openrouter had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 3 active contributors.

topPRs.title: fix: AI SDK v5 tool results extraction from steps content
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Updates tool execution to AI SDK v5 by parsing tool results from step content and using stepCountIs for stopping, returns steps, and bumps core/TypeScript versions.
> 
> - **Text generation (`src/models/text.ts`)**:
>   - Use `stopWhen = stepCountIs(maxSteps)` instead of `maxSteps` for tool execution limits.
>   - Parse tool results from step `content` entries of type `tool-result`, with base64 decoding.
>   - Return `steps` alongside `text`, `toolCalls`, and `toolResults`; adjust logging to `debug`.
> - **Types (`src/types/index.ts`)**:
>   - Extend `ToolResponse` with optional `steps` structure (typed `toolCalls`, `toolResults`, `text`, `finishReason`).
> - **Dependencies**:
>   - Bump `@elizaos/core` to `^1.6.1`; upgrade `typescript` to `^5.9.3`.
> - **Package**:
>   - Version bump to `1.5.14`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit e09208519177736662f32ffdff77faa5782daf16. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Tool responses can now include optional step-by-step metadata (tool calls/results, text, finish reason) for clearer multi-step interaction visibility.

* **Refactor**
  * Improved reliability of tool result capture and controlled execution via step-based processing.
  * Reduced log verbosity during generation and tool execution.

* **Chores**
  * Bumped version to 1.5.14.
  * Updated dependencies, including @elizaos/core and TypeScript, for compatibility and stability.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
